channel.title: Reporting on Identity Managed
channel.description: Recent content in Reporting on Identity Managed

item.title: Happy Independence Day -- Using PowerShell for Reporting
item.description: Unfortunately, my Independence day is not free – I am working. Just so happens I need to report on when computer objects are getting migrated to a new AD forest. Day 1 4 Day 2 30 Day 3 25 etc. Now I could have taken the data and imported it into SQL and then busted out some awesome queries in no time flat. But my buddy Craig Martin, keeps insisting how awesome this PowerShell stuff is.
